column1: We love our dogs. They love to race.

column5: Owned/Raced by: Sparkle and Fade Syndicate
column7: Trained by: B D F Craik

column1: RICCITELLI (1) - shifted off heels back straight. Contact final bend.
LOUDRED (3) - checked start losing ground. Raced in restricted room for a distance rounding the final bend making contact losing ground.
PORTLAND ECKLUND (4) - shifted in making contact start. Bumped first turn.
MRS. OPAL (5) - tightened making contact start.
OUR HOTROD (6) - shifted off heels back straight. Collided first turn.

column3: Jo's Wholesale & Sports Bar Taipa Tavern Sprint

column1: MAGIC EIGHT BALL (1) - solid contact for a distance back straight and entering the first turn losing ground and shifting out. Raced wide for the remainder of the event.
TAMANTHA (2) - contact for a distance back straight becoming tightened losing ground.
MY SNUGGLES (3) - collided first turn. Contact rounding then bend becoming unbalanced.
GO STOPPER (6) - jostled for a distance first turn becoming tightened losing ground. Tightened making contact rounding the bend becoming unbalanced losing ground.
PLATINUM SPIRIT (7) - jostled for a distance first turn shifting in onto the running rail. Veterinary examination revealed no abnormality.
SMASH BURTON (8) - slow away. Contact rounding the bend.

column5: Owned/Raced by: I Pave Opawa Syndicate

column1: ENJOY THE PERKS (1) - collided first turn.
PUZZLE TIN (3) - checked entering the first turn shifting out off heels.
BIRDS FLY HIGH (7) - shifted in first turn making contact on several occasions losing ground.
BIGTIME GAL (1) - contacted from behind back straight. Collided first turn.
BIG TIME RUSTY (2) - bumped after the start shifting in then tightened making contact losing ground. Shifted off heels first turn.
MADAM BUCKS (3) - bumped after the start then shifted in across heels back straight making contact.
ALWAYS DREAMING (4) - slow away. Checked racing toward the first turn. Inconvenienced first turn.
TRIBAL CONQUEST (5) - collided first turn becoming unbalanced and falling. Regained footing to finish the event some distance from the field. Veterinary examination revealed no abnormality.
DIGGER ACE (6) - contact several occasions back straight. Hampered by fallen runner first turn shifting wide losing ground.

JUST NIA (7) - tightened making contact for a distance back straight. Hampered by fallen runner first turn becoming unbalanced and falling. Regained footing to finish the event some distance from the field. Veterinary examination revealed no abnormality.
SNOOPY'S HERO (8) - contact for a distance back straight. Inconvenienced first turn.

JINJA BABE (8) - contact start and again first turn.
